import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import "./Footer.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Item from 'antd/lib/list/Item'; const Footer = () => { const [footer, setFooter] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/footer") .then(response => { setFooter(prev => [...prev, ...response.data]) }) }, []) return (
{footer.map((item) => {
Компания

О нас

Новости

Помощь

Контакты

{Item.phone}

+996 500 123 456

mail@gmail.com

Мы в социальных сетях

Instagram

Telegram

Whatsapp

Developed by Zeon 2020

})}
); }; export default Footer;
